summary: This is a standard Office of the Inspector General voluntary interview form used to document warnings and assurances given to an employee being asked to provide information as part of an investigation. It includes a waiver section signed by the witness and an OIG Special Agent.

persons.name: RPM
persons.role: Special Agent, Office of the Inspector General
persons.context: Special Agent RPM signed the OIG voluntary interview form as the OIG representative.

keyFacts: The document is a voluntary interview form from the Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General.
The form provides warnings and assurances to an employee being asked to provide information voluntarily as part of an OIG investigation.
The form includes a waiver section signed by a witness and OIG Special Agent RPM.
The investigation is being conducted pursuant to the Inspector General Act of 1978.
The form indicates the interview took place in New York.
